content:
TITLE: Compiling Starknet contract Sierra to CASM
DESCRIPTION: Shell command for using the compile-contract subcommand to compile a Starknet contract's Sierra code to CASM with output printed to console.
SOURCE: https://github.com/software-mansion/universal-sierra-compiler/blob/master/README.md#_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
```
universal-sierra-compiler \
  compile-contract \
  --sierra-path ./path/to/sierra.json
  
{"bytecode": ...}
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Compiling raw Sierra program to CASM
DESCRIPTION: Shell command for using the compile-raw subcommand to compile a raw Sierra program to CASM with output printed to console.
SOURCE: https://github.com/software-mansion/universal-sierra-compiler/blob/master/README.md#_snippet_5

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
```
universal-sierra-compiler \
    compile-raw \
      --sierra-path ./path/to/sierra.json
  
{"assembled_cairo_program": ...}
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Compiling Starknet contract Sierra to CASM with output file
DESCRIPTION: Shell command for compiling a Starknet contract's Sierra code to CASM with the result saved to a specified output file.
SOURCE: https://github.com/software-mansion/universal-sierra-compiler/blob/master/README.md#_snippet_4

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
```
universal-sierra-compiler \
    compile-contract \
      --sierra-path ./path/to/sierra.json
      --output-path ./path/to/casm.json
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing a specific prerelease version of Universal-Sierra-Compiler
DESCRIPTION: Shell command to install a specific prerelease version of Universal-Sierra-Compiler when you need to use an unstable Sierra version.
SOURCE: https://github.com/software-mansion/universal-sierra-compiler/blob/master/README.md#_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
```
curl -L https://raw.githubusercontent.com/software-mansion/universal-sierra-compiler/master/scripts/install.sh | sh -s -- v2.0.0-rc.0
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Compiling raw Sierra program to CASM with output file
DESCRIPTION: Shell command for compiling a raw Sierra program to CASM with the result saved to a specified output file.
SOURCE: https://github.com/software-mansion/universal-sierra-compiler/blob/master/README.md#_snippet_6

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
```
universal-sierra-compiler \
    compile-raw \
      --sierra-path ./path/to/sierra.json
      --output-path ./path/to/casm.json
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Adding Universal-Sierra-Compiler as a Rust dependency
DESCRIPTION: TOML snippet showing how to add Universal-Sierra-Compiler as a dependency in a Rust project's Cargo.toml file.
SOURCE: https://github.com/software-mansion/universal-sierra-compiler/blob/master/README.md#_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: toml
CODE:
```
universal-sierra-compiler = "2.1.0"
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing Universal-Sierra-Compiler with shell script
DESCRIPTION: Shell command to install the latest stable version of universal-sierra-binary using a curl command that downloads and executes an installation script.
SOURCE: https://github.com/software-mansion/universal-sierra-compiler/blob/master/README.md#_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
```
curl -L https://raw.githubusercontent.com/software-mansion/universal-sierra-compiler/master/scripts/install.sh | sh
```
